column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette seems to be the #1 critics choice steakhouse in the city. However
column2: found Bavette to be a boring dining experience based on the menu and wine list (they do allow corkage). Bavette is an old school steakhouse with hipster-speakeasy ambience. Forget Bavette
column3: pay a bit or lot more and go to RPM Steak.
